description.ruby-sapphire:
Inflicts severe damage but
makes the user faint.
description.emerald:
Inflicts severe damage but
makes the user faint.
description.gold-silver:
Very powerful but
makes user faint.
description.crystal:
Very powerful but
makes user faint.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The user explodes
to inflict terrible
damage even while
fainting itself.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user explodes to
inflict damage on all
Pokémon in battle.
The user faints upon
using this move.
description.platinum:
The user explodes to
inflict damage on all
Pokémon in battle.
The user faints upon
using this move.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user explodes to
inflict damage on all
Pokémon in battle.
The user faints upon
using this move.
description.black-white:
The user explodes to inflict damage on
those around it.
The user faints upon using this move.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user explodes to inflict damage on
those around it.
The user faints upon using this move.
description.x-y:
The user attacks everything around it
by causing a tremendous explosion.
The user faints upon using this move.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user attacks everything around it
by causing a tremendous explosion.
The user faints upon using this move.
description.sun-moon:
The user attacks everything around it by causing a
tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using
this move.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user attacks everything around it by causing a
tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using
this move.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user attacks everything around it by causing a
tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using
this move.
description.sword-shield:
The user attacks everything around it by causing a
tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using
this move.

effect.full: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses.  Inflicts regular damage.
